howItWorks.question: How does cash back work?
howItWorks.answer: When you click through our site to a store and make a purchase, we earn a commission. We share this commission with you as cash back.

whenPaid.question: When will I get paid?
whenPaid.answer: Cash back is typically confirmed within 30-90 days after purchase and can be withdrawn once you reach the minimum payout amount.

tracking.question: How is my purchase tracked?
tracking.answer: We use cookies to track your purchase. Make sure cookies are enabled in your browser and complete your purchase in the same session.

missing.question: What if my cash back is missing?
missing.answer: If your cash back doesn't appear within 7 days, you can submit a missing cash back claim from your account.
